Reviews.Title: “Terrible place”
Reviews.Author: Marcopolo111
Reviews.Content: We checked out minutes after checking in and it tooks a month to get refunded. Run down place, dirty, no elevator running, no electricity in corridors, bad mattress with dirty linen

Reviews.Title: “Sadly horrible and disgusting”
Reviews.Author: JLC20
Reviews.Content: Where do I began? First, I am deeply disappointed in saying that this hotel is a sad, sad place and an absolutely poor reflection of this extremely beautiful, charming historical town. I'm a New Yorker, but a sangermeÃ±a at heart. As a child, I admired the beautiful facades that line the streets of this historic town, including the Hotel Oasis. But, do not let the old world feel of this location fool you. As soon as I stepped in I was "welcomed" by an extremely unfriendly woman, who considered the continental breakfast to be sliced white bread, margarine and coffee. The restaurant looked deserted and not regularly used (as does the rest of the hotel, we were the only guests). I passed and headed to the room, here I was welcomed by an extremely small, stuffy room and a dried out lizard near the door. I decided to head to the (outdoor) pool, what a total disaster. Not only was it dirty and filled with leaves and dead insects, it's a pit stop for pigeons. As I laid on a beach chair, I watched two pigeons dive in and take a sip of water. I headed upstairs and what did I find? I giant roach crawling on the toilet! This was it for me, the lady downstairs didnâ€™t seem surprised or couldâ€™ve cared less that I was checking out on the same day of arrival. The money still hasnâ€™t been refunded. The mayor should be ashamed of himself. As I said, I'm a New Yorker and I expect these things on the subway. Not in a hotel, where a little more than three hundred dollars were spent. This place doesn't deserve a cent of the money spent at this disaster. Please, do not let this place stop you from visiting this beautiful town. Do check in at a hotel in a neighboring town and make San German one of your destinations in the west coast. It is just as beautiful as the old San Juan, rich in culture and warm residents.

Reviews.Title: “Its not as bad as the reviews”
Reviews.Author: mrvelez007
Reviews.Content: I stayed there for 2 nights and 3 days on a business trip and yes the building is old, but it was SUPER clean, it needs tlc as far as remodeling but the service was one on one, the manager is a great person and did his best to make my stay a welcome one, after advising about the need to remove the rugs. What I loved most was accessing the wifi from the awesome lobby, it was hard to focus on work and ignore the beautiful original antique wood work. Its not noisy or full of the hustle and bustle you would expect being in the town, I liked it and I would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible”
Reviews.Author: Jenny_7801
Reviews.Content: I live in PR but had to go to the west side for a family trip. Every where else was full. Did not read the reviews before I reserved the hotel did not have any choose. The hotel was dirty, the rug seem to never been clean, bedding was stain, the worst part it had cacaroches (alot). The continetal before is a lie just coffee and slide bread. No secruity at all. Front door close at 10 and then you get a key to walk in by a side gate. The parking in small and no secrutiy. To top off the rob my truck rear door the last night it was park right in front of the hotel. Do not stay hear you better off in a motel.

Reviews.Title: “Beware!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Trpt_man
Reviews.Content: By trpt_man, 09/20/08 In my opinion this is a really expensive place that's not worth the call. Rooms are small, dirty and smelly. I booked the night before I got there Once there I saw the rooms bad condition I turned around and told the front clerk I was leaving. I asked if there were any penalties or charges for the cancellation and the attendant said no. They still charged the room. The next month I called and asked to speak to the manager and when I started asking her about the charge she passed the telephone and I heard her say "Oh, you deal with him" when I asked who I was speaking to she said she was a former employee and she remembered me. After about 10 minutes of trying to reason with her, I asked to speak to the manager and she did not want to take the call, I could hear her in the background. Then I was rudely told to call my bank and she just hung up

Reviews.Title: “try this hotel in a year or two or three”
Reviews.Author: kibbe
Reviews.Content: This is a beautiful old brick building with lots of possibilities. But currently, avoid staying here if you can. The room was in pretty sad shape--even had a broken box frame on the bed. NO HOT WATER!!! Not even after several calls. They still charged full price. Thread-bare towels. No food service but they did have a charming diningroom. Couldn't get into the wireless internet. Best part was that it was very clean.

Reviews.Title: “Worst Place Ever!!!”
Reviews.Author: IMNOTHERE
Reviews.Content: This place is really bad. dirty, noisy, smelly, bug infested (roaches and mosquitos) The service was really poor We had a terrible experience there. We didnt even got our money back because of the "policy" of the hotel. They stole our money and didnt care for our bad experience there. the girl that check us in tried talking to the owner about our money but he said that id we already paid, that was out problem.... Health and fire department should close this place down... HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE AND PLACE. HORRIBBLLLEE!!!!

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay; historic with all modern facilities; convenientlylocated”
Reviews.Author: pnumomicroscopilicus
Reviews.Content: HOTEL OASIS IN SAN GERMAN;is a great historic place to stay has been recently renovated with all modern facilities;close to all mayor beaches and historic sites without becoming islated;has avery friendly staff;;IN THE S.W. THEY ARE #1

Reviews.Title: “the worst motel on Earth!!!!”
Reviews.Author: MiaMobile
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the dusty, filthy ,dirty, horrendous place due that I was looking for a place in San German, PR. First, The parking is in a lot one block away very dark w/o illumination. There is no elevators. I had to carry my luggage to the second floors by the stairs without help. The room, What a room. The carpet has not been clean since the open this motel in more than 40 yrs, is so dirty that you have to use your shoes all the time. Beds are raggidy and the mattress is old and out of shape. When I went to the bathroom is so dirty the shower that I preferred to skip a bath that night. And they had the odyssey of charging 80 dollars a night for a place that not even pigs would stay. After a horrible scary night (By the way the door has the lock broken), I left the hotel in the morning and requestes to have my second night credit to my credit card, which they refused. I assumed they charge in advanced to catch a bunch of fools like me. I told that I hope with the money of the second night they could make some repairs.I called the Mayaguez Holiday INN instead, They were happy to welcome me after this trauma and the HOLIDAY INN is a Five star hotel compared with the pigstay of OASIS. Thanks Hoilday INN.! M.Ruiz from LA

Reviews.Title: “The worst place in the island!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This place is a "chiquero" (a dump). The room was dark. The A/C unit didn't work, in fact it leaked onto the carpet. WE HAD TO BUY A FAN to circulate the little cold air the a/c provided!! There's only 1 cook for everyone. which meant 1 hour waiting time for your food! (fun guy though, the cook; he's the only good thing about the place) You never see the manager, only some girl who can only say "I'm sorry ma'am"! The pool!! LORD!!!! No chance I was getting in there!! The water was GREEN and it had nothing to do with the tiles underneath! The furniture looked like it had been salvaged from a flood years ago! The room smelled like it hadn't been opened in years! OHH!! And there's no parking!!! Only some pebbled lot with no lines! You have to leave your car's plate number in case someone blocks you or you're blocking them!!! Let me tell you, I don't drink, but after 2 hours in that place, I was ready to drink my sorrows away! They refused to give back my money... (they say no refunds when you call and reserve!! They're not dumb!) They should shut down the place!! It's also infested with pigeons... there were pigeon feathers all around the pool and in the water! YUCK!! In short.... DON'T EVER THINK ABOUT STAYING THERE!!! You're better off sleeping in your car! (I don't have fotos because I haven't developed them yet! But I will!! I took pictures!)

Reviews.Title: “review of the Oasis”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This parador is very bad no elevator , tv does not work, air condition doesn't work either

Reviews.Title: “No Way!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This place is really bad. Very dark, ALOT of mosquitos and rooms looked un touched for weeks. Made a reservation but when we arrived, we could not stay there. So we tried to get a refund but the hotel refused. They gave us a credit for our NEXT visit.....yea right. Stay in "La Parguera". Really good service.

HotelInfo.Name: Parador Oasis
HotelInfo.Address: 72 Calle Luna | P.O. Box 144, San German 00683, Puerto Rico
